column3: Concept ACK, but the distfile needs to include autogen-generated files.\n\nAnd I don't see why it should be running submodules' `make dist`s...
I agree, for GNU conformance and support for exotic systems.\n\nMoved the univalue issue+pr to its upstream repo.
